timeline.bodyText:
If this class is the equivalent for queryProcessTasks (as per BAPL-1526), I'm missing some attributes like:

caseDefinitionId (maybe this is not valid as this is a process and not a case?)
caseInstanceId (maybe this is not valid as this is a process and not a case?)
taskInputVariables - I guess this is matched with inputVariables member of this class? wouldn't make sense to rename it to taskInputVariable? wdyt?
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.bodyText:
I'm missing a class for the queryProcess query as per BAPL-1526.
So far we have defined the following classes:

CaseInstanceCustomVars class - for queryCases search.
CaseUserTaskWithVariables class - for queryCaseTasks search.
ProcessInstanceUserTaskWithVariables class for queryProcessTasks search.

What about a class for "queryProcesses" search?
